name: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio website using React, Tailwind CSS, and DaisyUI.
Responsive design ensuring compatibility across different devices.
Integration with GitHub and LinkedIn for showcasing projects and professional profiles.
Utilizes modern web development tools and practices for a scalable and maintainable codebase.
Deployed and hosted using AWS Amplify for seamless CI/CD and secure, scalable hosting.

name: Admission System Web Application
description: Developed a web application for managing admissions with permission-based login using Spring Security.
Implemented backend functionalities with Spring Boot and Hibernate, ensuring efficient data management.
Designed the frontend using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Thymeleaf, providing an interactive and user-friendly interface.
Utilized PostgreSQL to store data for students, teachers, and courses, enabling robust data handling and security.
